claimData.description: Water damage from burst pipe in kitchen. Damage to flooring, cabinets, and drywall requiring professional restoration.
Rear-end collision on Highway 55. Bumper damage and taillight replacement needed.
Storm damage to commercial building roof. Multiple shingles blown off, potential structural damage to support beams.
Flood damage to basement and first floor. Located in recently designated flood zone, extensive water damage to belongings and structure.
Vintage car theft from secured garage. 1967 Mustang Fastback stolen during home break-in.
Equipment damage due to operator error. Excavator hydraulic system failure during non-approved operation.
Construction equipment vandalism at job site. Spray paint damage and minor mechanical tampering to three pieces of equipment.
Professional liability claim from client alleging misrepresentation in property sale. Legal fees and potential settlement costs.
Home office equipment theft during break-in. Computer equipment, monitors, and smart home devices stolen.
Personal belongings damaged in apartment fire caused by neighboring unit. Smoke and water damage to clothing and furniture.
